Title: Flagellants
Legend: Entirely consumed by their zealous faith in the God-King, these holy warriors long for nothing more than to martyr themselves in battle. Armed with little more than clubs and flails, they leap upon their foes in a frenzied mob.

PitchBattleProfile.Notes: Battleline if army includes Pontifex Zenestra, Matriarch of the Great Wheel

Intro: Each model in a Flagellants unit is armed with Castigating Flails and Clubs.
